spyr:burn.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, take #b

spyr:growing_darkness.NAME: Growing Darkness
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you are in ShadowForm gain #b

spyr:never_ending_blaze.NAME: Never Ending Blaze
DESCRIPTIONS: While in LightForm, Burn stacks don't decrease.

spyr:staunch_bleeding.NAME: Staunch Bleeding
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon losing HP from a card, gain #b

spyr:unholy_fire.NAME: Unholy Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose #b

spyr:whispering_madness.NAME: Whispering Madness
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you are in ShadowForm add Madness+ to the top of your deck and discard piles.
